attributes.description:
This Suzuki S-Presso offers a lot, with neat features such as the touch screen radio, reverse camera, park distance-control, a ground clearance of 180mm, comfortable drive and a unexpected powerful feel behind the wheel of this 1.0L engine.

Stop by Autotops at 23 York Street today to take a test today, our staff are ready to assist, finance can be arranged, and trade-ins are welcome.

Autotops situated in George 23 York street our friendly sales team will assist you in all enquiries we offer in house finance and deliver nationwide . Trade-ins are welcome.

At Autotops we thrive through the earned loyalty of our clients, friends, and family. We function as a team, work ethically, and remain focused on exceeding expectations of our customers. Our customers buy dreams, and we strive to make them great.

attributes.description: From the deep depth of something beautiful an SUV is born for your comfort, enjoyment and driving pleasure. This example is a 2019 Toyota Rush 1.5 Auto, it looks the part and backs it up like you will not believe with every feature strategically placed for improved comfort and driving experience. Its spacious interior comes with power steering, multi- functioning steering wheel, central locking remote, electric windows, navigation system, electric mirrors, air conditioning, reverse camera, roof racks, climate control and excellent legroom for both driver and rear passengers. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client are highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
